A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie is a disgrace to the franchise. It ruins every character in it. They missed a huge opportunity with Luke and gave him a sad sad sad farewell. 
Finns supposed growing romance is a pathetic attempt as there is no chemsitry at all between the two. 
Yoda was turned into a circus clown.
The casino planet was a boring painful-to-watch segment. 
The music was great but cued all wrong so it never added anything to a scene\, which is sad to say for a Star Wars film. 
Rose "saving" Finn was stupid. He was going to sacrifice himself to save everyone... she nearly kills him and herself by stopping him... so she kept everyone in danger for almost nothing... thats not heroic\, thats selfish... this movie was a disaster narratively. Anyone that complained Batman v Superman was disjointed cannot possibly say this one is not
